definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: You can put that into calculator.
Bring a calculator so that you can calculate the correct tip.
sentences.chinese: 带一个计算器好计算正确的小费。

sentences.english: Thank you, fine people of StackOverflow, for any ideas you might have.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的计算器，细腻的人，你会有什么想法。

sentences.english: Traditional calculators are limited to adistingrated calculating process.
sentences.chinese: 传统的单步式计算器有着极大的局限性。

sentences.english: It doesn't matter. A big calculator, you know, I am holding you on your honor.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，一个大的计算器，我充分地信任你们。

sentences.english: Many algebra teachers expressed concern about their use in the low lower grades.
sentences.chinese: 很多代数学老师对低年级学生使用计算器表示了忧虑。

sentences.english: We don't have 450 calculators for you.
sentences.chinese: 我们不会为你们准备450个计算器的。

sentences.english: What do you think of calculators in the classroom?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待在课堂使用计算器？

sentences.english: Recently we asked how you feel about calculators in school.
sentences.chinese: 最近我们在调查人们如何看待在学校使用计算器。

sentences.english: And another has turned it into a synthesizer.
sentences.chinese: 还有人让计算器变成了合成器。

sentences.english: Look, I can spell your name on my calculator!
sentences.chinese: 看着，我可以在计算器上拼写你的名字。

sentences.english: A specialized quadratic function calculator from Implicit Softwar…
sentences.chinese: 一款专业的二次函数计算器。

sentences.english: Can I use a calculator to add up these figures?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用计算器来加这些数字吗？

sentences.english: Geiger counters detect radiation emitted from decaying atoms.
sentences.chinese: 盖格计算器从原子裂变过程中探测到放射出的辐射量。

sentences.english: Which would mean, it could act like a calculator.
sentences.chinese: 这就是说，它完全可以表现的像个计算器。
现在，打开了“ESN的校验和计算器”。

definition: to do a sum in writing/written calculation
four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
